name: Space Ape
description:
Space Ape is a fun side scrolling arcade experience that is just bananas! Guide Dimitri the Russian space explorer around asteroids, aliens and comets to get the high score.

Space Ape is made by adults on the autism spectrum at the nonPareil Institute. At nonPareil, autistic adults gain digital technology skills in various domains and work toward building apps, games and items for the digital marketplace. While doing so, our members also acquire social and work-readiness skills preparing them for success in higher-education and employment settings.
